verses.verse: Now Jericho <WH3405> was straitly <WH5462> shut up <WH5462> because <WH6440> of the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478>: none went out <WH3318>, and none came in <WH935>. was: Heb. did shut up, and was shut up

And the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto Joshua <WH3091>, See <WH7200>, I have given <WH5414> into thine hand <WH3027> Jericho <WH3405>, and the king <WH4428> thereof, and the mighty men <WH1368> of valour <WH2428>.

And ye shall compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892>, all ye men <WH582> of war <WH4421>, and go round about <WH5362> the city <WH5892> once <WH6471> <WH259>. Thus shalt thou do <WH6213> six <WH8337> days <WH3117>.

And seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> shall bear <WH5375> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns <WH3104>: and the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117> ye shall compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>, and the priests <WH3548> shall blow <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>.

And it shall come to pass, that when they make a long <WH4900> blast with the ram's <WH3104> horn <WH7161>, and when ye hear <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, all the people <WH5971> shall shout <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout <WH8643>; and the wall <WH2346> of the city <WH5892> shall fall down <WH5307> flat <WH8478>, and the people <WH5971> shall ascend up <WH5927> every man <WH376> straight before him. flat: Heb. under it

And Joshua <WH3091> the son <WH1121> of Nun <WH5126> called <WH7121> the priests <WH3548>, and said <WH559> unto them, Take up <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285>, and let seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bear <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>.

And he said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Pass on <WH5674>, and compass <WH5437> the city <WH5892>, and let him that is armed <WH2502> pass on <WH5674> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>.

And it came to pass, when Joshua <WH3091> had spoken <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, that the seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> the seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns <WH3104> passed on <WH5674> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, and blew <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>: and the ark <WH727> of the covenant <WH1285> of the LORD <WH3068> followed <WH1980> them <WH310>.

And the armed <WH2502> men went <WH1980> before <WH6440> the priests <WH3548> that blew <WH8628> <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>, and the rereward <WH622> came <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark <WH727>, the priests going on <WH1980>, and blowing <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>. rereward: Heb. gathering host

And Joshua <WH3091> had commanded <WH6680> the people <WH5971>, saying <WH559>, Ye shall not shout <WH7321>, nor make any noise <WH8085> with your voice <WH6963>, neither shall any word <WH1697> proceed <WH3318> out of your mouth <WH6310>, until the day <WH3117> I bid <WH559> you shout <WH7321>; then shall ye shout <WH7321>. any noise: Heb. your voice to be heard

So the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892>, going about <WH5362> it once <WH6471> <WH259>: and they came <WH935> into the camp <WH4264>, and lodged <WH3885> in the camp <WH4264>.
And Joshua <WH3091> rose early <WH7925> in the morning <WH1242>, and the priests <WH3548> took up <WH5375> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>.

And seven <WH7651> priests <WH3548> bearing <WH5375> seven <WH7651> trumpets <WH7782> of rams' horns <WH3104> before <WH6440> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068> went on <WH1980> continually <WH1980>, and blew <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>: and the armed men <WH2502> went <WH1980> before <WH6440> them; but the rereward <WH622> came <WH1980> after <WH310> the ark <WH727> of the LORD <WH3068>, the priests going on <WH1980>, and blowing <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>.
And the second <WH8145> day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> once <WH6471> <WH259>, and returned <WH7725> into the camp <WH4264>: so they did <WH6213> six <WH8337> days <WH3117>.

And it came to pass on the seventh <WH7637> day <WH3117>, that they rose early <WH7925> about the dawning <WH5927> of the day <WH7837>, and compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> after the same manner <WH4941> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>: only on that day <WH3117> they compassed <WH5437> the city <WH5892> seven <WH7651> times <WH6471>.

And it came to pass at the seventh <WH7637> time <WH6471>, when the priests <WH3548> blew <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>, Joshua <WH3091> said <WH559> unto the people <WH5971>, Shout <WH7321>; for the LORD <WH3068> hath given <WH5414> you the city <WH5892>.

And the city <WH5892> shall be accursed <WH2764>, even it, and all that are therein, to the LORD <WH3068>: only Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> shall live <WH2421>, she and all that are with her in the house <WH1004>, because she hid <WH2244> the messengers <WH4397> that we sent <WH7971>. accursed: or, devoted

And ye, in any wise <WH7535> keep <WH8104> yourselves from the accursed thing <WH2764>, lest ye make yourselves accursed <WH2763>, when ye take <WH3947> of the accursed thing <WH2764>, and make <WH7760> the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478> a curse <WH2764>, and trouble <WH5916> it. accursed: or, devoted a curse: or, devoted

But all the silver <WH3701>, and gold <WH2091>, and vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and iron <WH1270>, are consecrated <WH6944> unto the LORD <WH3068>: they shall come <WH935> into the treasury <WH214> of the LORD <WH3068>. consecrated: Heb. holiness

So the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> when the priests blew <WH8628> with the trumpets <WH7782>: and it came to pass, when the people <WH5971> heard <WH8085> the sound <WH6963> of the trumpet <WH7782>, and the people <WH5971> shouted <WH7321> with a great <WH1419> shout <WH8643>, that the wall <WH2346> fell down flat <WH5307>, so that the people <WH5971> went up <WH5927> into the city <WH5892>, every man <WH376> straight before him, and they took <WH3920> the city <WH5892>. flat: Heb. under it

And they utterly destroyed <WH2763> all that was in the city <WH5892>, both man <WH376> and woman <WH802>, young <WH5288> and old <WH2205>, and ox <WH7794>, and sheep <WH7716>, and ass <WH2543>, with the edge <WH6310> of the sword <WH2719>.

But Joshua <WH3091> had said <WH559> unto the two <WH8147> men <WH582> that had spied out <WH7270> the country <WH776>, Go <WH935> into the harlot's <WH2181> house <WH1004>, and bring out <WH3318> thence the woman <WH802>, and all that she hath, as ye sware <WH7650> unto her.

And the young men <WH5288> that were spies <WH7270> went in <WH935>, and brought out <WH3318> Rahab <WH7343>, and her father <WH1>, and her mother <WH517>, and her brethren <WH251>, and all that she had; and they brought out <WH3318> all her kindred <WH4940>, and left <WH3240> them without <WH2351> the camp <WH4264> of Israel <WH3478>. kindred: Heb. families

And they burnt <WH8313> the city <WH5892> with fire <WH784>, and all that was therein: only the silver <WH3701>, and the gold <WH2091>, and the vessels <WH3627> of brass <WH5178> and of iron <WH1270>, they put <WH5414> into the treasury <WH214> of the house <WH1004> of the LORD <WH3068>.

And Joshua <WH3091> saved <WH2421> Rahab <WH7343> the harlot <WH2181> alive <WH2421>, and her father's <WH1> household <WH1004>, and all that she had; and she dwelleth <WH3427> in <WH7130> Israel <WH3478> even unto this day <WH3117>; because she hid <WH2244> the messengers <WH4397>, which Joshua <WH3091> sent <WH7971> to spy out <WH7270> Jericho <WH3405>.

And Joshua <WH3091> adjured <WH7650> them at that time <WH6256>, saying <WH559>, Cursed <WH779> be the man <WH376> before <WH6440> the LORD <WH3068>, that riseth up <WH6965> and buildeth <WH1129> this city <WH5892> Jericho <WH3405>: he shall lay the foundation <WH3245> thereof in his firstborn <WH1060>, and in his youngest <WH6810> son shall he set up <WH5324> the gates <WH1817> of it.
So the LORD <WH3068> was with Joshua <WH3091>; and his fame <WH8089> was noised throughout all the country <WH776>.
